description.value:
Your battle insights make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents. You don't need to succeed at a flat check to target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} creatures.

You're not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} to creatures that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from you (unless you're flat-footed to them for reasons other than the hidden condition), and you need only a successful @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to target a hidden creature.

While you're adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} creature of your level or lower, it is instead only hidden from you.
